comment: Oh bless your heart. You’d think this was your first year in the Midwest. Never safe to have that thought until April is over.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / bless-01

                  :part-of (y / you))

            :ARG1 (y3 / year

                  :domain (t2 / this)))
      :snt3 (s / safe-01

                  :ARG1 (t4 / that))
            :time (u / until

            :time (e / ever)))
